title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list comes up, ignoring the cancellation request.
EB: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog should honor the cancellation request. Alternatively, the cancel button should be disabled. To achieve this, when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run, pass false for the 'cancellable' parameter.
SR:
1. Open the exception breakpoint dialog.
2. Attempt to add a new exception breakpoint.
3. While the progress dialog is visible, click on the cancel button.
